snippet: I joined Koders as a Developer Intern at the beginning of this year and it is undoubtedly the best decision I've made. The work environment here is great and my mentors are really supportive. It's been 6 months working here and I feel I am …

My experience at Koders has been amazing!!! After working for 11  months into the Web  Development as Developer  and I got to learn more than I ever did in a college. Given complete freedom to explore my creative side along with constant support from my mentors, I was able to enhance my current skills and develop some new ones.

Koders is a company that values its employees and strives to maximise their opportunities for education and development, where employees can express any concerns they may have. A workplace with a laid-back culture and coworkers with whom I agree. The best part was the freedom to express one's creativity without limitations.

Because there is no place like home, the name KODERS was chosen.We talk about the aspect of the workplace, it just adds to that. But at Koders, I have experienced a feeling similar to my habitat. Their congeniality in the work environment …

Koder's is not a business, but rather a family to me. All of the mentors are friendly and eager to assist. It's beneficial to work with coworkers who share your interests and perspectives. Sourav Jena sir, who supervises all tech-related tasks and makes it operational, is the best person I've encountered here.

My experience at Koders has been astonishing! Two months into the marketing internship and I got to learn more than I ever did in a classroom. Given complete freedom to explore my creative and analytical side along with constant support …
Needed help with a project's front end development and these guys came in clutch. Very professional and skilled. They have delivered an amazing quality work. 100% Satisfied
Very good team. Not only from a technical perspective but also from the human perspective. Helped us a lot even in difficult situations!

My internship at Koders as a developer intern was great. My mentor definitely knew how to trust her comrades. The overall workspace environment felt like home. I learned a lot about how things actually work at ground level via live projects, which was refreshing.

I worked on live projects for the first time and learned a lot. I also met Abhishek at koders, he is a mentor and friend to me, he taught me a lot, especially in the design segment. I made so many new friends here. My mentors have guided me …

As an intern developer, I worked on electron project crystal mini 2 for the first time, it was great, the working environment is refreshing. Everyone was very helpful. It was a wonderful experience, the mentors are very supportive, especially Panther. Best experience.

When I started at Koders as a Developer Intern, I didn’t realise I’d become a part of this doting, solicitous and heuristic family. My journey from an Intern to now an executive has been enlightening, educative and brimming with …
Very good experience with Koders. Helpful, friendly and high quality software development. Professional.
It's already been 2 weeks since I joined and the environment here is amazing as it feels like working at home.

The workplace is amazing!
Since I got to work as an intern, I learnt a lot of new things. Apart from that, the Kore team is very helpful. I had a great time working with these bunch of Kool people.
Here at KODERS the learning curve is excellent as it is both exciting & pushing and I'm grateful for all the new learnings everyday
I have had an excellent experience working at Koders. The work environment is very professional and friendly.
As a customer I had a great experience, the Team responded and worked fast, they also changed up minor inconveniences along the way without a hassle. Very Satisfied!!
Good support throughout the project, looking forward to give more projects.
Nice place to work. Started my internship few month ago and because of friendly environment I am comfortable enough to give my best.
Incredibly friendly workplace with ample opportunities to learn from helpful mentors constantly boosting professional growth.
Very attentive staff, super straight forward with communication, and overall a great company. Will continue to be a customer.
very skilled developers
Very amazing experience❤️
Best experience ❤️
